nodes.bodyText: Shouldn't the inject target be in Lnet/minecraft/whatever format?

hm. good question, and i hope i haven't goofed my previous PRs because of this. I've just been copying from IDEA's bytecode viewer: INVOKESTATIC net/minecraft/world/dimension/DimensionType.getAll ()Ljava/lang/Iterable;
Well, it at least seems to work as intended as-is. I'll leave "should it be changed anyway" as something for future consideration.
i con't care about the signature format as long as it's readable and it applies
